title: Generating a project with Kotlin as the main language will cause project creation to fail
body:
#### Issue details
See title, project generator will fail when selecting "Use Kotlin" in Advanced menu.  Att

#### Reproduction steps/code
Original, not working:
- Check subprojects:  desktop, android, iOS-moe
- Check extensions:  AI
- Open Advanced, check "IDEA" and "Use Kotlin"
- Click Generate

Modified, working:
- Repeat steps for Original, but in Advanced, menu, leave "Use Kotlin" unchecked

#### Version of LibGDX and/or relevant dependencies
1.9.8 (none other tested)

#### Stacktrace

#### Please select the affected platforms
- [X] Android
- [X] iOS (robovm)
- [X] iOS (MOE)
- [X] HTML/GWT
- [x] Windows
- [X] Linux
- [X] MacOS
This issue affects the project generator directly.
